casebody.data:
Drey ANDRADE
v.
LEGO SYSTEMS, INC. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 17, 2019

Vincent F. Sabatini, Newington, in support of the petition.

Victoria Woodin Chavey and Collin O'Connor Udell, Hartford, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 188 Conn. App. 652, 205 A.3d 807, 2019 WL 1233599 (AC 41322)(2019), is denied.
